Text: Good upload, thanks! Pretty good quality, but still... XViD? It's 2013, why does anybody still encode movies with XViD? x264 is superior in every way. I'm not bitching, this is free and I'm happy with it, but just fyi... start using x264! It's better.
@mikedongs a lot of people's dvd players can't read the x264, which is why XViD is still pretty prominent

nice one it is watchable

v-8 ratings based on the quality of this dvdscr in xvid coded form but still it could have been brought down to 400mb with x264
